Location.Name: Front Gate
Location.Description: A large sandstone gate, crowds of people. This is the front gate of the capital city of Purrjata. To the east through the gate is the Dust District.

Location.Name: Dust District
Location.Description: The district of travelers, full of inns and traders.

Location.Name: Stick District
Location.Description: The district of the stick people, beggars selling what little they can find.

Location.Name: Savannah
Location.Description: The barren savannah, full of wild animamls
